sourcesContent:
import { useContext } from 'react' import ReduxFirestoreContext from './ReduxFirestoreContext' /** * @name useFirestore * @description React hook that return firestore object. * @returns {object} - Extended Firestore instance * @see https://react-redux-firebase.com/docs/api/useFirestore.html * @example Basic * import React from 'react' * import { useFirestore } from 'react-redux-firebase' * * export default function AddData() { * const firestore = useFirestore() * * function addTodo() { * const exampleTodo = { done: false, text: 'Sample' } * return firestore.collection('todos').add(exampleTodo) * } * * return ( *
* *
* ) * } */ export default function useFirestore() { return useContext(ReduxFirestoreContext) }
